meaningMnemonic: If you're <radical>anti</radical>-<radical>eat</radical> your <kanji>meal</kanji> will just sit in front of you, uneaten. Food is meant to be eaten! Stop trying to fast and take a bite.
readingMnemonic: As you stare at the <kanji>meal</kanji>, <reading>Han</reading> (はん) Solo appears before you and takes a bite! This is what happens if you don't eat your food, someone else will eat it.
